model

Class Process

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Process
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrivalProcess, BurstProcess, PrioritizedProcess

    public class Process
extends Object
    Represents a process. Holds burst time, wait time, and turn around time as doubles for simplified calculations. Stores the process name as a string. Allows for auto generation of burst and names. Wait time and turn around time must be set manually.
    Author:
    Peter Vukas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int id
      The unique identifier of an instance of a process.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Process()
      Assigns a random burst time and an auto-generated name
      Process(double arrivalT)
      Assigns a random burst time and an auto-generated name with the specified arrival time
      Process(double burstTime, double arrivalT)
      Assigns an auto-generated name
      Process(double burstT, String n)
      Creates a process with a random arrival time
      Process(String n)
      Creates a process with only a custom name, all other fields are randomized
      Process(String n, double arrivalT)
      Assigns the process a random burst time.
      Process(String name, double burstTime, double arrivalT)

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public final int id
        The unique identifier of an instance of a process. Cannot be changed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Process

        public Process(String name,
               double burstTime,
               double arrivalT)
        throws InvalidTimeException
        Parameters:
        burstTime - Double value of the process burst time
        name - String value of the process name
        arrivalT - Double value of the time the process arrived in the cpu
        Throws:
        InvalidTimeException - Thrown when the burst time or arrival time is invalid

      • Process

        public Process(double burstTime,
               double arrivalT)
        throws InvalidTimeException
        Assigns an auto-generated name
        Parameters:
        burstTime - Double value of the process burst time
        arrivalT - Double value of the process arrival time into the CPU
        Throws:
        InvalidTimeException - Thrown when the burst time or arrival time is invalid

      • Process

        public Process(String n,
               double arrivalT)
        throws InvalidTimeException
        Assigns the process a random burst time.
        Parameters:
        n - String value of the process's name
        arrivalT - Double value of the process arrival time into the CPU
        Throws:
        InvalidTimeException

      • Process

        public Process(double arrivalT)
        throws InvalidTimeException
        Assigns a random burst time and an auto-generated name with the specified arrival time
        Parameters:
        arrivalT - Double value of the time the process arrived in the cpu
        Throws:
        InvalidTimeException - Invalid Arrival Time

      • Process

        public Process()
        throws InvalidTimeException
        Assigns a random burst time and an auto-generated name
        Throws:
        InvalidTimeException - An unexpected error occurs in this case, and you should contact the creator of this method asap for fixing

      • Process

        public Process(double burstT,
               String n)
        throws InvalidTimeException
        Creates a process with a random arrival time
        Parameters:
        burstT - Burst time of this process
        n - Name of this process
        Throws:
        InvalidTimeException - Invalid burst time

      • Process

        public Process(String n)
        throws InvalidTimeException
        Creates a process with only a custom name, all other fields are randomized
        Parameters:
        n - Custom process name
        Throws:
        InvalidTimeException - An unexpected error occurs in this case, and you should contact the creator of this method asap for fixing

        public boolean isWaitTimeAssigned()

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Returns:
        Boolean. If true, the process has been flagged as finished.

      • toggleFinished

        public void toggleFinished()
        Inverts the status of finished. The default state on instantiation is false.

      • getBurstTime

        Returns:
        Double value of the burst time.

        public void setBurstTime(double bTime)
                  throws InvalidTimeException
        Parameters:
        bTime - Double value of the proposed new burst time.
        Throws:
        InvalidTimeException - Thrown if the bTime is < 0

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns:
        String value of the process's name.

      • getWaitTime

        public double getWaitTime()
        Returns:
        Double value of wait time. Must be assigned via the setWaitTime() method first.

                 throws InvalidTimeException
        Parameters:

        InvalidTimeException - Thrown if the wTime is < 0
